name: get_song_related
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube_music_api_detailed.
Tool description: Detailed Youtube Music API. Lyrics, Trends, Albums, Artists, Songs, Users, Playlists, Songs etc.
API description: Gets related content for a song. Equivalent to the content shown in the “Related” tab of the watch panel.

browse_id.description: The unique identifier for the song being queried.
